#Newline A pattern ? uma express?o lingu?stica formal que consiste em#Newline
#Newline (1) Palavras em liguagem natural em maiusculas.#Newline
#Newline (2) O simbolo * que corresponde a uma palavra ou sequencia de palavras.#Newline
#Newline (3) O simbolo _ tem a mesma funcionalidade que o * excepto que vem#Newline
#Newline depois da letra Z na ordem lexicografica.#Newline
#Newline (4) a marca <name/> ? substitu?da pelo#Newline
#Newline nome do rob?.#Newline
#Newline
#Newline Note a diferen?a entre OLA e OLA *.#Newline
#Newline OLA encontra apenas essa palavra no aiml ("Ol?.")#Newline

column2: O QUE E UMA CATEGORIA * CLIENTE
column5: <srai>O QUE E UMA CATEGORIA#Newline                <star index="2"/>#Newline            </srai>

#Newline AIML consists of a list of statements called categories. Each#Newline
#Newline category contains an input pattern and a reply template.#Newline
#Newline The syntax of an AIML category is:#Newline
#Newline
<category>
<pattern> PATTERN </pattern> <template> Template </template>
#Newline </category>
#Newline
#Newline or#Newline
#Newline
<category>
<pattern> PATTERN </pattern>
<that> THAT </that>
#Newline <template> Template </template>
</category>
#Newline
#Newline The AIML category tags are case-sensitive. Each open tag has an#Newline
#Newline associated closing tag. This syntax obviously derives from XML.#Newline
#Newline

#Newline David Bacon pronounces it "Eggsmell". XML is the Extensible#Newline
#Newline Markup Language. Like many "standards" in computer science#Comma XML#Newline
#Newline is a moving target. In the simplest terms#Comma XML is just a generalized#Newline
#Newline version of HTML. Anyone is free to define new XML tags#Comma which#Newline
#Newline look like HTML tags#Comma and assign to them any meaning#Comma within a context.#Newline
#Newline AIML is an example of using the XML standard to define a specialized#Newline
#Newline language for artificial intelligence.#Newline
#Newline
#Newline One reason to use an XML language is that there are numerous tools#Newline
#Newline to edit and manipulate XML format files. Another reason is that an#Newline
#Newline XML language is easy for people to learn#Comma if they are already#Newline
#Newline familiar with HTML. Third#Comma AIML programs contain a mixture of#Newline
#Newline AIML and HTML (and in principle other XML languages)#Comma a considerable#Newline
#Newline convenience for programming web chat robos.#Newline
#Newline
#Newline A good resource for information on XML is www.oasis-open.org.#Newline
